item.description: This is another new place for us to visit.  It’s a nice venue and they are providing delicious appetizers for our pleasure.   Come join us after work for a great time and mingle with old and new friends!   There is no charge.   For info, call Gail 860-582-8229. Directions to 2095 Berlin Turnpike:   Take I-91 S to Exit 28 to Berlin Turnpike (Rts. 5/15), facility on right next to Siesta Motel.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be inside waiting for you.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Happy Hour
